cause.description:
This cause is dedicated to 3 goals:
1. The dissemination of the necessary scientific and critical thinking skills to help the public, politicians, and corporations understand the issues fully we as a society are currently facing.
2. To make people aware of the necessity to start planning for our future by petitioning the government to start doing the research and development to improve our space technology to the point where the Asteroid belt can be colonized.
3. Said petitioning of governments world wide to do the R&D on biodomes, better space craft propulsion systems, mining equipment designed for asteroids, etc. and to actually fork up the money to colonize the asteroid belt before it is too late.
Website: http://humanitysfuturecosmocracy.blogspot.com
1. Technological development is a human right.
2. Environmentally friendly technology is a spinoff of space technology, so is environmental science.
3. The wealth of the solar system is the common property of all humanity and should be shared equally. That includes the education etc. for all so that they all may share in it.
